select * from bu_store_info where 1=1 <#if query??>
<#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( store_id like '%${key}%' or store_name like '%${key}%' or belong_region like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.code??> and store_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and store_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.belongRegion??> and belong_region = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.belongRegion)}' </#if>
<#if query.createDateBegin?? && query.createDateEnd??> and date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createDateBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createDateEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateDateBegin?? && query.updateDateEnd??> and date_format(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateDateBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateDateEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.tenantCode??> and tenant_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantCode)}' </#if> </#if>
